channel.title: CreativeScape - Ultimate Server Development!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/1ookgo.png[/img][/center]
.•*´¨) `¸.•´¸.•*´¨)¸.•*¨) (¸.•´ (¸.•CreativeScape is a RS2 server, which has been developed over a period of 6 months. This server will bring you back to basic RuneScape in 06-07. Server is based on external stable and clean base source called Shard Revolution. There are [i]thousands[/i], yes [i]THOUSANDS[/i] of Monsters on our server. They all have 50-95% accurate drops and correct animations, which makes our game more realistic.
[center]• If you do enjoy [i]realistic game play[/i], [i]perfect combat[/i], [i]pretty flawless skills[/i], [i]any kind of Mini games[/i] - this server is what you been looking for! [img]http://209.85.12.227/html/emoticons/smile.gif[/img]
[b]Features[/b] - Active community forum - Dedicated players - [b]Fully playable world map[/b] - Over [b]2500[/b] active monsters - Over [b]10000[/b] monster drops - Over [b]100[/b] single stores - Over [b]400[/b] amazing Dialogues - Fully working clue scrolls with [b]99%[/b] accurate Runescape rewards - Over [b]8000[/b] usable items. - Perfect Player vs player combat - Perfect Player vs NPC combat - [b]100%[/b] working Prayer - Over [b]5[/b] flawless mini games - Pest control - [b]100%[/b] Fight caves (Including 63 waves) - [b]99%[/b] Fight pits - [b]97%[/b] Castle wars - [b]100%[/b] Barrows mini game - Skillcapes with their own skillmasters - [b]99.5%[/b] Ancient and normal magicks - [b]7[/b] awesome quests - Working NPC and Player following - Unique weekly updates - [b]99.5%[/b] of accurate skills Complete - Anti-flood - Anti-dupe - Perfect uptime
[b]Server Screenshots[/b] [img]http://i29.tinypic.com/2eg49ac.png[/img] [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/2ccwfaw.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/2rww8ox.png[/img] [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/i5r8zo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/2lnv1pc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/2vj4vf7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/4hr4hs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/2ptqs84.png[/img] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/10wi42h.png[/img] [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/5wffo1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/2i7pzqw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/2w40lqh.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/2igowth.png[/img] [IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/21b90eo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/24mzx44.png[/img] [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/119pb1x.png[/img] [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/f9l204.png[/img] [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/1hczza.png[/img] [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/20ff8sn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/2n89zqu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/2exrkae.png[/img] © 2008-2009 CreativeScape [img]http://www.easycounter.com/counter.php?apelsiins09[/img][/center]

item.title: CreativeScape - Ultimate Server Development!
item.dc:creator: @pkpoison pkpoison
item.description:
@pkpoison wrote:

[quote="`jeba, post:28, topic:305889"]Hello BattleScape? Sorry if this seems like flame, but your Warriors guilds Animated Armour furnace is in the same place as Pali’s (not a big point really), your Clues are probably exactly the same.

Also all your features seem to BE Palidino’s features. Npc following, “perfect combat”. Quests, honestly… There’s 9 in BattleScape, you could of removed two and taken credits… Pest control? 8k+ usable items? I really feel this is BS317.

However, if I’m incorrect, you’ve done a very good job, I don’t like the cannon though. Pisses me off in RuneScape, makes me want to rage.[/quote]

Its shards lul

Read full topic
